review: I absolutely love my Fire Stick. We have had it a few months now. It makes using Netflix so much easier. I also have Amazon Prime and have found plenty to watch using the fire stick. We also play games through it as well. And I can now play Pandora through my t.v and stereo system.  It  renders things quickly and have not had any problems with it. I wish we had gotten this sooner. Having the remote means we do not have to use our phone to cast things like you do Google Chrome.
